Skull of Fire

miscellaneous (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 338
magic bonus [boosters]: +F
resist cold [coldres]: -5

Requires 5F5D to forge (F1D1)

A Fire wizard's skull inscribed with runes of flame and obedience, it aids its owner in the use of Fire magic. The owner of this skull will suffer more from any cold effects that might befall him.
